#define readint(n) c=gc();while(c < '0' || c > '9') c = gc();while(c >= '0' && c <= '9'){n =n*10 +c-48;c=gc();}
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#include<stdio.h>
char c;
int main()
{
int t=0,i;
readint(t);
while(t--)
{
long long n=0;
long long m=0;
readint(n);
readint(m);
long long a=1,b=1,ch;
for(i=2;i<=n;++i)
	{ch=a;
	a=a+b;
	b=ch+(2*b);
	a%=m;
	b%=m;
	}


printf("%lld/%lld\n",a,b);
}
return 0;
}
